sentences.en: Cash cuts have halved the number of places available on training courses.
sentences.cn: 经费削减使培训名额减少了一半。

sentences.en: Dr Lee believes that men who exercise can halve their risk of cancer of the colon.
sentences.cn: 李医生相信，锻炼身体能使患结肠癌的风险降低一半。
把辣椒切成两半并去籽。

sentences.en: Halve the peppers and char the skins under a hot grill.
sentences.cn: 将甜椒剖成两半，在滚热的烤架上烤至外壳微焦。

sentences.en: Halve the pineapple and scoop out the inside.
sentences.cn: 将菠萝对半切开，挖出里面的果肉。
把马铃薯竖着切成两半。

sentences.en: Halve the tomatoes, then cut them up coarsely.
sentences.cn: 把西红柿切成两半，然后再粗粗地切一下。

sentences.en: He and I decided to halve expenses on our trip.
sentences.cn: 我和他决定均摊旅行费用.

sentences.en: I halve the cost of living.

sentences.cn: 我要跟你平均分摊费用.

sentences.en: If we halve the mass carried, sliding friction is also halved.
sentences.cn: 如果我们将质量减半, 滑动摩擦力也会减半.

sentences.en: Let's halve the project between our two teams.
sentences.cn: 让我们两个队平均分担这项工程吧.

sentences.en: Let's halve the work between the two of us.
sentences.cn: 让我俩平均分担这份工作吧.

sentences.en: Peel carrots and parsnips; halve crosswise to separate thick and narrow parts.
sentences.cn: 为胡萝卜和欧防风去皮; 斜切,把厚的和薄的部分分开.

sentences.en: Then, the share prices of the world's biggest banks halve in minutes.
sentences.cn: 当时, 诸多全球大型银行的股价瞬间减半.

sentences.en: They are going to halve my salary.
sentences.cn: 他们准备把我的薪水减半.

sentences.en: They had to halve the recipe to serve two.
sentences.cn: 他们不得不把按处方配的药减半以供两个人使用.

words.tran_cn: 一半的；不完全的；半途的

trans.tran_en: to cut or divide something into two equal pieces

trans.tran_cn: 把…分成两半，把…减半，对分，平摊
